trans-unit.source: Remove the cover of your system

seg-source.mrk: Remove the cover of your system

target.mrk: Remove the cover of your system

trans-unit.source: This is a simple task requiring a screwdriver.

seg-source.mrk: This is a simple task requiring a screwdriver.

target.mrk: This is a simple task requiring a screwdriver.

trans-unit.source: First be sure you are grounded.

seg-source.mrk: First be sure you are grounded.

target.mrk: First be sure you are grounded.

trans-unit.source: Perform the operation in a well ventilated room.

seg-source.mrk: Perform the operation in a well ventilated room.

target.mrk: Perform the operation in a well ventilated room.

trans-unit.source: Unscrew the screws that hold the cover to your system.

seg-source.mrk: Unscrew the screws that hold the cover to your system.

target.mrk: Unscrew the screws that hold the cover to your system.

trans-unit.source: Store them in a safe place.

seg-source.mrk: Store them in a safe place.

target.mrk: Store them in a safe place.

trans-unit.source: Remove the cover and place it in a safe place as well.

seg-source.mrk: Remove the cover and place it in a safe place as well.

target.mrk: Remove the cover and place it in a safe place as well.
